title: !BUGREPORT! Camera random fixing
body:
Gold 1 Ranked - Master Yi{{champion:11}}  - Min~30 
Camera Toggles on fixed on my champion randomly, I am unable to remove the fixing, even with the option menü, toggle camera fixing. 
Closing game doesnt work. 
Camera was champion-center fixed even in death, even while loosing the match the screen did not switch to the nexus.
Please fix as soon as possible, I would suggest removing the camera champion-centered toggling completely... Part-timely pressing space is enough.

Problem2:
Master yi e Wuju style does only 14(+x) instead of 15(+x) True dmg on hit when activated on lvl 1.
Levels 2-5 not checked. 

Thank you very much riot.

replies.body:
Passiert mir auch hin und wieder mal - meine Lösung: 
Das Viereck für die Champposition in der Minimap mit der Maus hin- und herschieben. Bei mir (!) hat es dadurch bisher immer funktioniert.
